#BlackMagicCraft #Episode193 #FieldTrip

In this video I built a neat piece of scatter terrain for Dungeons & Dragons inspired by weird wooden structures I found in the woods. 

Stick tents? Seems like a cool place for some sort of shaman to perform rituals. 

Some specific items used in this build:
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)
